name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Platform Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in deploying and managing cloud-based infrastructures using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**. Proficient in implementing **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **Terraform** for container orchestration and infrastructure as code, enhancing deployment efficiency and system resilience. Expertise in CI/CD practices utilizing **Jenkins**, **ArgoCD**, and GitOps methodologies to streamline software delivery and automation processes.

Experienced in monitoring applications and ensuring system performance with tools like **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, **Loki**, **Mimir**, **ElasticSearch**, and **Kibana**. Strong background in Agile and Kanban methodologies to foster team collaboration and improve project delivery timelines. Bringing a solid foundation in networking, including DNS and VPN configurations, ensuring secure and efficient communications.

As a Full Stack Developer, I have a proven track record of building high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors using modern **JavaScript**/**TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies. I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI and ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, alongside experience in compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
